parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Username as used in the GROHE ONDUS App, usually your e-mail address.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password as used in the GROHE ONDUS App.

parameter.name: applianceId
parameter.label: Appliance ID
parameter.description: The UUID of the appliance as retrieved from the GROHE ONDUS API.

parameter.name: roomId
parameter.label: Room ID
parameter.description: The ID of the room the appliance is in as retrieved from the GROHE ONDUS API.

parameter.name: locationId
parameter.label: Location ID
parameter.description: The ID of the location the room is in as retrieved from the GROHE ONDUS API.

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds used to poll the API for new data. Defaults to the configuration of the appliance itself as retrieved from the API, usually 15 minutes.
